mapper.sql: CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_ATTR, WEBSITE, STOCK_CODE, UNIT_HIGHER, OWNER, NUMBER_EMPLOYEE, INDUSTRY_ID, CUSTOMER_TYPE, CUSTOMER_STATE, CUSTOMER_SOURCE, HEAD_ID, PHONE_FIXED, PHONE_MOVE, CUSTOMER_FAXs, BANK, BANK_ACCOUNT, NEXT_CONTACT_DATE, EMAIL, SIC_CODE, PAY_WAY, IS_EFFECTIVE, ADDRESS_DETAIL, NOTE_INFORMATION, COMPANY_ID, LAST_MODIFY_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from XS_CUSTOMER_DETAIL
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into XS_CUSTOMER_DETAIL (CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_ATTR, WEBSITE, STOCK_CODE, UNIT_HIGHER, OWNER, NUMBER_EMPLOYEE, INDUSTRY_ID, CUSTOMER_TYPE, CUSTOMER_STATE, CUSTOMER_SOURCE, HEAD_ID, PHONE_FIXED, PHONE_MOVE, CUSTOMER_FAXs, BANK, BANK_ACCOUNT, NEXT_CONTACT_DATE, EMAIL, SIC_CODE, PAY_WAY, IS_EFFECTIVE, ADDRESS_DETAIL, NOTE_INFORMATION, COMPANY_ID, LAST_MODIFY_DATE ) values (#{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitHigher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numberEmployee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{industryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{phoneFixed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneMove,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerFaxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextContactDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEffective,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noteInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

update XS_CUSTOMER_DETAIL
